title: Mixed Berry Cocktail

preparations.content: Place sugar in mixing bowl then grind <b>15 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add frozen berries, lemon juice and 50 g sparkling wine then mix <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add remaining 700 g sparkling wine and mix <b>15 sec/speed 2<b>. Strain through a fine sieve then divide between champagne glasses. Serve immediately.
